price: 18. Not a word does he (or she) utter but there is a watcher by him ready (to record it).[3]
arabic: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: mā yalfiẓu min qawlin illā ladayhi raqībun ʿatīdun
